name: 2D Shooter (aaryanyijukaalexdacosta)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project.

Modifications;

  1. Changed the background of the main menu by adding the sprite to make it look nice
  2. Changed the title of the Main menu to my own name 
  3. Added one more level to my Project that's Level three
  4. Increased number of enemies in every Level
  5. Modified every level to differ from each other whereby on level2 Black_holes and Planets were added, on Level3 Asteriods, space stations, wall of Asteriods and shooter sprites were added
  6. Modified the text fonts and styles
  7. Modified the rate of speed at which the enemies attacks the prayer in every level

Credits goes to my instructors

Created by ARYANYIJUKA ALEX- A Computer Scientist from Kabale University-Uganda
